examples: Anyone can learn to code with practice.
I don't trust anyone in this town.
Qualquer pessoa pode aprender a programar com prática.
Eu não confio em ninguém nesta cidade.

suggested: Why did the potato decide to become a DJ? Because anyone can mash-up music!
The thought of feeling alone or disconnected from anyone can be disheartening.
It's frustrating when anyone makes assumptions or judgments about us without knowing our full story.
Did you know that anyone can learn a new skill or pursue a passion, regardless of age or background?
There's no specific smell associated with 'anyone', but the scent of acceptance and inclusion can be comforting.
The physical sensation of being hugged or held by anyone can be a sign of love and support.
The concept of anyone can be connected to the idea of community, diversity, and belonging.
